sense.def:
Do
uporabljamo za tvorbo nikalne oblike glavnih glagolov, tako da postavimo
not
ali
-n't
za pomožnim glagolom in pred nedoločnik glavnega glagola.

seg.quote: You don't have to go.

sense.def:
Do
uporabljamo za tvorbo vprašanj, tako da osebek postavimo za pomožni glagol in pred nedoločnik glavnega glagola.

seg.quote: What did he say?
Do you think that's possible?

sense.def:
Do
uporabljamo za nadomeščanje in nanašanje na spredaj stoječo glagolsko skupino.

seg.quote: She meets lots more people than I do.
I like cooking and so does John.

sense.def:
Do
uporabljamo v vprašalnih dostavkih.

seg.quote: She made a lot of mistakes, didn't she?

sense.def:
Do
uporabljamo za poudarjanje glavnega glagola, kadar ni drugega pomožnega glagola.

seg.quote: I did buy a map but I must have lost it.
Do sit down.

sense.def:
Do
uporabljamo z
-n't
ali
not
, kadar hočemo nekomu povedati, naj se ne vede na določen način.

seg.quote: Don't speak to me like that.

sense.def:
To do something
pomeni narediti neko dejanje, opraviti dejavnost ali nalogo.

seg.quote: What are you doing?
I do the cooking and Brian does the cleaning.

sense.def:
Do
uporabljamo s samostalnikom, ki se nanaša na neko stvar, kadar govorimo o nečem, kar kdo s tisto stvarjo redno počne. Na primer:
to do one's teeth
pomeni umivati si zobe.

seg.quote: She had done her hair for the party.
We have a man to do the garden.

sense.def:
To do something about a problem
pomeni truditi se, da bi rešili neki problem.

seg.quote: They promised that they were going to do something about immigration.

sense.def:
Do
uporabljamo, kadar želimo povedati, da ima nekaj povsem določeno posledico ali učinek.

seg.quote: Their policies have done more harm for the working class than ours.
They are afraid of what it might do to the children.

sense.def:
Če nekoga vprašamo:
what do you do
, sprašujemo, kakšna je njegova služba.

seg.quote: What do you want to do when you leave school?

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
does well or badly
, hočemo povedati, da je uspešen oziroma neuspešen.

seg.quote: I didn't do very well in my exams.
It all depends how the Labour Party do at this next election.

sense.def:
To do a subject
pomeni študirati neki predmet v šoli ali na univerzi.

seg.quote: I'm doing biology.

sense.def:
Z besedo
do
govorimo o hitrosti, ki jo nekaj doseže ali zmore doseči.

seg.quote: The car's already doing 70 miles per hour.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
will do
, je zadovoljivo.

seg.quote: No other school will do.
Two thousand will do me very well.

sense.def:
Če nekoga vprašamo
what did you do with something
, sprašujemo, kam je nekaj dal.

seg.quote: What did you do with the keys?

sense.def:
Če nekoga vprašamo
what are you doing in a particular place
, izražamo presenečenje, da je tam, kjer je.

seg.quote: What are you doing here? I thought you were still in London.

sense.def:
Če nekdo
would do well to do something
, bi moral tisto storiti.

seg.quote: She would do well to steer clear of men.

sense.def:
Če za nekaj rečemo
it has to do with
ali
it is to do with
, hočemo povedati, da je tisto z nečim povezano.

seg.quote: The basic argument has nothing to do with agriculture.
It's got something to do with an economic crisis.

sense.def:
Če rečemo:
I could do with something
, hočemo povedati, da nekaj potrebujemo.

seg.quote: I think we could all do with a good night's sleep.

sense.def:
‘How do you do?’
je uradnejši način pozdravljanja.

To do away with something
pomeni nečesa se znebiti.

seg.quote: Modern medicines have not done away with disease.

sense.def:
To do someone out of something
pomeni po krivici povzročiti, da nekdo nečesa nima;

seg.quote: He did me out of £500.

sense.def:
To do something up
pomeni nekaj pritrditi.

seg.quote: He did his shoelaces up.

sense.def:
To do up an old building
pomeni popraviti in prebeliti staro stavbo;

To do without something
pomeni nekako preživeti kljub temu, da nečesa nimamo.

seg.quote: Many Victorian households did without a bathroom altogether.
If you don't have cigarettes, you must simply do without.
